meanings.definition: A diminutive of the given name Heidi.
meanings.english_definition: A pet form of the name Heidi.

examples.sentence: Hidie is such a cute nickname for Heidi!
examples.translation: HidieはHeidiのとても可愛いニックネームだね！

etymology.value: Derived as a diminutive or pet form of the name Heidi.
